list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a band of colors, as seen in a rainbow, produced by separation of the components of light by their different degrees of refraction according to wavelength.
used to classify something, or suggest that it can be classified, in terms of its position on a scale between two extreme or opposite points.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the left or the right of the political spectrum
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bên trái hoặc bên phải của phổ chính trị
